document_data.name: The Tricky Thief
document_data.mainbody: '''The Tricky Thief''' was a a magical miscellany and curio shop in the hamlet of [[Skull Crag]] in the [[Storm Horn Mountains]] of [[Cormyr]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located on the southern side of the village.
document_data.Services: The Tricky Thief was filled to the brim with weird arcane paraphernalia, including stinging magical stones and inflated odd sound-making [[goat]] [[bladder]]s.
document_data.History: In the mid-14{{th}} century DR, The Tricky Thief operated at odd hours with long lunch breaks, it catered to curious travelers of the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]].
